publications.name: Correlation recurrent units: A novel neural architecture for improving the predictive performance of time-series data
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI)
publications.summary: Proposed a new neural architecture (CRU) that performs time-series decomposition within a neural cell and learns correlations between decomposition components. JCR Q1, Top 0.85%.

publications.name: Long-term forecasting of maritime economics index using time-series decomposition and two-stage attention
publications.summary: A hybrid framework for long-term prediction of container volume and Baltic Panamax Index using time-series decomposition and attention mechanisms. JCR Q1, Top 16.17%.

publications.name: Deep learning framework for regional maritime collision risk assessment using CNN and Grad-CAM
publications.summary: A regional collision risk assessment framework integrating AIS-derived traffic representations, CNNs, and explainable AI (Grad-CAM). JCR Q1, Top 3.08%.
